summary.p: This bundle (35-3016 palm leaf manuscript) contains two texts. The first one is Ṣaṣṭipūrtiśāntiprakāraḥ of Bodhāyana. The second one is Vedārthaprakāśa on Rudrādhyāya of Sāyanācārya in Telugu script.

The first 8 folios (1-8) contain the Ṣaṣṭipūrtiśāntiprakāraḥ of Bodhāyana, incomplete. Bodhāyana explained in his gṛhyasūtra-s how to perform ṣaṣṭipūrtiśānti and ugrarathaśānti elaborately. The ṣaṣṭipūrti is celebrated on completion of 60 years of age of the male. The Hindu calendar has 60 years named Prabhava, Vibhava, etc. that repeat themselves after every 60 years in an identical sequence. the Ṣaṣṭipūrti marks the completion of one such cycle. The Veda says janmābde, janmamāse ca svajanmadivase tathā, janmarśe caiva kartavyā śāntirugrarathāhvayā | devālaye nadītīre svagṛhe vā śubhasthale | The Ṣaṣṭipūrtiśānti should be performed in the sixty first year and in the same month and day of birth according to the Indian Zodiac. As part of the celebrations, the couple's children perform their parents' second wedding. This is the reason for a grand family reunion to incorporate an important event in the couple's married life.

After this, the folio's numbering again starts from one. The second text is the Vedārthaprakāśa on the Rudrādhyāya, of Sāyanācārya. Sāyanācārya made a commentary on the Rudrādhyāya called Namakam and Camakam in the fourth chapter of Yajussaṃhitā. He was a Mīmāṃsā scholar. Sāyanācārya was a Sanskrit-language writer and commentator. His major work is his commentary on the Vedā-s, Vedārthaprakāśa, literally the meaning of the Vedā-s made manifest.

msItem.title: Ṣaṣṭipūrtiśāntiprakāraḥ
msItem.author: Bodhāyana
msItem.rubric: śrīr astu avighnam astu śrīmadgurubhyo namaḥ
msItem.incipit: bodhāyanoktaṣaṣṭhipūrtiśāntiprakāraḥ | manuṣyāṇam āyurabhivṛddhyarthaṃ viṃśatyuttaraśatāyurmadhye ṣaṣṭivarṣe janmamāse janmapakṣe janmanakṣatre tithivāre yogakaraṇalagne akhaṇḍanakṣatre vā śāntiṃ vittānusāreṇa tadā kuryād yathāvidhi |
msItem.explicit: anantaraṃ ṣaṣṭhipūrtidevatāsvarūpamṛtyuprasādasiddhyarthaṃ paraṃ mṛtyor iti mantreṇa aṣṭottaraśataṃ gaḻūcim ādadhyāt | tenaiva palāśadūrvātilalājapāyasadravyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak aṣṭottaraśatasahasram aṣṭottaraśataṃ vā kuryāt | anantaraṃ

msItem.title: Vedārthaprakāśaḥ
msItem.author: Sāyanācārya
msItem.rubric: śrīmadgurubhyo namaḥ śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śrīmahāsarasvatyai namaḥ
msItem.incipit: yasya niśvasitaṃ vedā yo vedebhyo 'khilaṃ jagat | nirmame tam ahaṃ vande vidyātīrthamaheśvaram | smṛtyāgamapurāṇeṣu rudrādhyāyapraśaṃsanam | bahvasti tadvistareṇa rudrakalpe 'bhidhāsyate | iha karmāṅgatā yādṛgvarṇitā brāhmaṇena tām | boddhuṃ śabdārthamātrasya vivṛtiḥ kriyate sphuṭā |
msItem.explicit: vājaś ca me prasavaś ca me prayatiś ca me prasitiś ca me dhītiś ca me kratuś ca me svaraś ca me ślokaś ca me śrutiś ca me jyotiś ca me suvaś ca me | ity etaiḥ dvādaśabhir mantravākyair ekāhutir hotavyā | īdṛśā uttarā āhutayaḥ | prāṇaś ca me 'pānaś ca me ity ādibhir niṣpādyāḥ | te ca homā dvādaśa | teṣu madhye vilambābhāvaḥ sāṃtatyam | na tu mantrakarṇaṇoḥ sahopakramaḥ| tasmāt pūrvanyāyena mantrante karmasaṃnipātasya nāsti vighnaḥ |
msItem.finalRubric: iti śrīsāyanācāryaviracite mādhavīye vedārthaprakāśe yajuḥsaṃhitāyāṃ caturthakāṇḍe saptamaprapāṭhake camakabhāṣye ekādaśo'nuvākaḥ. śrīrudrabhāṣyaṃ camakabhāṣyaṃ ca saṃpūrṇam |
msItem.colophon: yad akṣarapadabhraṣṭaṃ mātrāhīnaṃ ca yad bhavet | tat sarvaṃ kṣamyatāṃ deva śiva sāmba namo 'stu te | śrī umāmaheśvarārpaṇam astu |
